tuv.seg: Maternity and infant care services
Seirbhísí máithreachais agus leasa naíonán
The Maternity and Infant Care Scheme provides an agreed programme of care to all expectant mothers who are ordinarily resident in Ireland
Cuireann an Scéim Chúraim Máithreachais agus Naíonán clár socraithe cúraim ar fáil do gach bean atá ag iompar clainne agus a bhíonn ina gnáthchónaí in Éirinn
This service is provided by a family doctor (GP) of your choice and a hospital obstetrician
Cuirtear an tseirbhís seo ar fáil ag do rogha gnáthdhochtúir agus cnáimhseoir ospidéil
You are entitled to this service even if you do not have a medical card or GP visit card
Tá tú i dteideal an tseirbhís seo a fháil fiú muna bhfuil cárta leighis agat
Virtually all GPs have agreements with the Health Service Executive (HSE) to provide these services; they do not have to be part of the medical card scheme
Tá comhaontú ag an gcuid is mó LG le Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte na seirbhísí seo a sholáthar; ní gá dóibh a bheith mar chuid den chóras LG agus cártaí leighis
The Maternity and Infant Care Scheme also provides for two post-natal visits to the GP
Soláthraíonn an Scéim do dhá chuairt iar-bheireatais chuig an ghnáthdhochtúir freisin
The combined medical services are provided by your family doctor (GP) and a hospital obstetrician
Cuireann do rogha dochtúra agus cnáimhseoir ospidéil an cóir leighis seo ar fáil

On your first pregnancy, the GP provides an initial examination, if possible before 12 weeks, and a further 5 examinations during the pregnancy, which are alternated with visits to the maternity unit/hospital

Le linn do chéid toirchis, soláthraíonn an LG scrúdú tosaigh, más féidir, roimh 12 sheachtain, agus tugtar faoi 5 scrúdú bhreise i gcaitheamh an toirchis, a mbíonn cuairteanna a thabhairt ar an aonad máithreachais/ospidéal i gceist le cuid díobh
The schedule of visits may be changed by your GP and/or hospital obstetrician, depending on your individual situation
Féadfaidh to LG agus/nó d’obstatraí ospidéil an sceideal cuairteanna a athrú, ag brath ar do chás féin aonair
For subsequent pregnancies you will have an initial examination and a further 6 examinations
I gcás toircheas ina dhiaidh sin, déanfar scrúdú tosaigh ort agus 6 scrúdú bhreise ina dhiaidh sin
If you have a significant illness, for example, diabetes or hypertension, you may have up to 5 additional visits to the GP
Má bhíonn tinneas nach beag ar an mbean mar shampla, diabaetas nó brú fola ard, d'fhéadfadh suas le 5 chuairt breise ar an LG a bheith curtha ar fáil
After the birth, the GP will examine the baby at 2 weeks and both mother and baby at 6 weeks
Tar éis na breithe déanfaidh an LG scrúdú ar an leanbh ag coicís agus ar an máthair agus ar an leanbh ag 6 seachtain

The mother is entitled to free in-patient, out-patient and accident and emergency/casualty services in public hospitals in respect of the pregnancy and the birth and is not liable for hospital charges

Tá an mháthair i dteideal seirbhísí saor in aisce othair chónaithigh, othair sheachtraigh agus timpistí agus éigeandála/taismí a fháil in ospidéil phoiblí maidir leis an toircheas agus leis an mbreith agus níl sí faoi dhliteanas íoc as aon chinn de mhuirir an ospidéil
Care for other illnesses which you may have at this time, but which are not related to your pregnancy is not covered by the Scheme
Ní chuimsítear cúram do thinnis eile a d’fhéadfadh bheith ort ag an tráth seo, ach nach mbaineann le do thoircheas faoin Scéim seo
However, if you opt to be a private patient of your consultant, you will be liable for the full range of in-patient charges
Áfach, má roghnaíonn tú bheith i d’othar príobháideach de chuid do chomhairligh, beidh tú faoi dhliteanas íoc as an réimse iomlán de mhuirir othair chónaithigh
The public health nurse visits the mother and baby at home free of charge, usually within 72 hours of returning home from hospital
Tar éis na breithe, tabharfaidh an t-altra sláinte poiblí cuairt ort agus ar do leanbh sa bhaile, go hiondúil taobh istigh de 72 uair an chloig ón am a scaoiltear amach as an ospidéal tú
The GP who attends the mother also provides care for the new-born baby
Cuireann an LG a raibh an mháthair ag freastal air/uirthi cúram ar fáil don leanbh nua freisin
They will provide two developmental examinations free of charge at 2 weeks and 6 weeks following the birth
Bíonn dhá scrúdú forbartha i gceist sa chéad 6 seachtain tar éis na breithe atá saor in aisce
The baby's entitlement to other free GP services depends on whether they have a medical card or GP visit card
Ní bheidh an leanbh i dteideal seirbhísí eile a fháil saor in aisce ón LG muna bhfuil cárta leighis ag an leanbh féin

This means that visits to the GP for any conditions related to the baby's health during this six-week period or afterwards are not covered by the scheme unless the baby has a medical card or GP visit card. See below for details of how to apply

Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcaifear íoc as pé cuairt ar an LG, seachas an dá scrúdú forbartha, muna bhfuil cárta leighis ag an leanbh féin, más sa chéad 6 seachtain tar éis na breithe nó níos déanaí a tharlaíonn na cuairteanna
If the baby is born in a hospital, it is usual to carry out screening for metabolic disorders (the Guthrie or heel prick test)
Más san ospidéal a saoltar an leanbh go hiondúil déantar scagthástáil do easláinte áirithe (tastáil Guthrie nó an tastáil phrioctha sáile) ann
If the baby is born at home, the test may be carried out by the GP or in the out-patients department of a hospital
Más sa bhaile a saoltar an leanbh is féidir leis an LG an tastáil a dhéanamh
This test requires parental consent
De rogha air sin, is féidir é a dhéanamh i rannóg na n-othar seachtrach in ospidéal
You can find out more about this test on newbornscreening.ie
Ní mór do thuismitheoirí an linbh cead a thabhairt an tastáil seo a dhéanamh
Your GP should have application forms for the Maternity and Infant Care Scheme, which you and your GP complete together
Ba cheart go mbeadh na foirmeacha cuí iarratais ar sheirbhísí faoin Scéim um Chúram Máithreachais agus Naíonán ag an LG
Return the form to your Local Health Office
Seol an fhoirm chuig an Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil
If you are not eligible for a medical card you can register your child for a GP visit card for children under 6
Ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an altra sláinte poiblí ag an ionad áitiúil sláinte le heolas a fháil maidir le ranganna réamhbheireatais atá ar fáil
If you have a medical card, you can apply for one for your baby if you are getting Child Benefit for them
Mura bhfuil tú incháilithe do chárta leighis, féadfaidh tú do leanbh a chlárú do chárta cuairte LG do leanaí faoi 6 bliana d’aois
